name: The last journey of the Kaiser
name_original: The last journey of the Kaiser
description:
Story

A lengthy and bloody war with the Coalition has left the Empire in ruins. Republican rebels have enjoyed growing support among the war exhausted people and have secretly begun peace negotiations with the enemy. Help the Kaiser escape to the friendly neighboring Duchy of Eastbourg.

Controls

Use W  and S to tilt the cannon

Use A and D to rotate the cannon

Use 'Space' to fire the cannon

Comments

The game still needs a lot of polishing and balancing if you have any ideas or critique, please feel free to leave a comment.
